original_text:
It is good for me that I was afflicted,
    that I might learn your statutes.
korean_text: 고난 당한 것이 내게 유익이라 이로 말미암아 내가 주의 율례들을 배우게 되었나이다

sentences.original_text: It is good for me that I was afflicted
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 고난을 받은 것은 내게 유익했습니다

sentences.original_text: that I might learn your statutes
